text:
When a live|live document is checked out by user foo deactivate is not greyed
out for user bar.

If deactivate is invoked it leads to:
Exception during commit or rollback:
org.apache.lenya.cms.repository.RepositoryException: The node [node lenya://baz]
is already checked out by another session!
creator: ragaller@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: Deactivate.getObjectsToLock() has to return the live document and the live sitetree.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Is there an easy way to reproduce this issue?

creator: ragaller@apache.org
text: user foo edits a document (live|live) another user tries to deactivate the same document
